Simulates microarray data based on a given network.

Source: R/micro_array-network.R
gene_expr_simulation-network-method.Rd

Simulates microarray data based on a given network.

# S4 method for network
gene_expr_simulation(
  network,
  time_label = 1:4,
  subject = 5,
  peak_level = 100,
  act_time_group = 1:4
)

Arguments

network

A network object.
time_label

a vector containing the time labels.
subject

the number of subjects
peak_level

the mean level of peaks.
act_time_group

[NULL] vector ; at which time the groups (defined by sort(unique(group))) are activated ?

Value

A micro_array object.

Author

Bertrand Frederic, Myriam Maumy-Bertrand.

Examples


data(Net)
set.seed(1)

#We simulate gene expressions according to the network Net
Msim<-Patterns::gene_expr_simulation(
  network=Net,
  time_label=rep(1:4,each=25),
  subject=5,
  peak_level=200)

#> Le chargement a nécessité le package : VGAM
#> Le chargement a nécessité le package : stats4
#> Le chargement a nécessité le package : splines
head(Msim)

#> $microarray
#>        log(S/US) : P1T1 log(S/US) : P1T2 log(S/US) : P1T3
